page.title: 14CURRENT TOPICS IN THE NEWS
page.content:
{PRIDE OF THE FLEET}- July 1st 1985. Portsmouth welcomed today the latest of a long line of Ark Royals(the 5th since the 16th Century). The Â£320 million pound aircraft carrier was greeted by a fly past of its own Harrier jets and a flight of older aircraft of the Fleet Air Arm.
{ {BRIGHTON BOMB CHARGE}- July 1st 1985. A man accused of causing the explosion in the Grand Hotel,Brighton last October during the Conservative Party Conference appeared at Lambeth Magistrates Court today. The man,a member of the I.R.A.,appeared with 6 others charged with murder and the attempted murder of Mrs Thatcher(P.M.)
